original_text: The prison guard did not worry about anything that Joseph had authority over. He saw that the Lord was with Joseph. Whatever Joseph did, the Lord helped him to do it well.
korean_text: 간수장은 그의 손에 맡긴 것을 무엇이든지 살펴보지 아니하였으니 이는 여호와께서 요셉과 함께 하심이라 여호와께서 그를 범사에 형통하게 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: The prison guard did not worry about anything

sentences.korean_translation: 요셉에게 권한이 있는 모든 것에 대해

sentences.original_text: He saw that the Lord was with Joseph
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주께서 요셉과 함께 계심을 보았다

sentences.original_text: the Lord helped him to do it well
